question: The Border Security Force of India is to collaborate with which country to prevent smuggling?
explanation:
The Border Security Force (BSF) of India and Border Guard Bangladesh have decided to strengthen joint night vigil, to prevent smuggling.
Recently, the countries organized a joint co-ordination conference in Guwahati. Both BSF and BGB have identified the vulnerable regions for night vigil. The countries will also take steps to prevent infiltrations thorough Indo - Bangladesh border.
